title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Online Learning Based on Physical Models for Geotechnical Engineering Principles Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering mechanics and earth science concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more soil consolidation phenomena by analyzing physical model demonstration videos.
Learners can apply fundamental soil mechanics principles (e.g., slope stability, bearing capacity calculations) to real-life cases using whiteboard animations.
Learners collaboratively design and submit a geotechnical investigation project report using online collaboration tools (teams of five).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
